title: Sweet Peas with Lettuce and Mint
introduction: Enjoy the delightful combination of sweet peas, refreshing mint, and crisp lettuce in this simple yet flavorful dish. A touch of butter and finely chopped onions bring all the elements together, offering a side dish that's both fresh and satisfying. Perfect whether you're using fresh or frozen peas.
ingredients: 2 cups fresh shelled peas or 1 (10-ounce) package frozen peas
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: In a medium saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until tender and golden, about 10 minutes.
Add the peas, lettuce, mint leaves, and salt and pepper to taste. Stir in 2 tablespoons water and cover the pan. Cook 5 to 10 minutes or until the peas are tender. Serve hot.
